mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId , user_nickname AS userNickname , DATE_FORMAT(user_birth,'%Y년%m월%d일') AS userBirth , user_gender AS userGender , user_email AS userEmail , user_telecom AS userTelecom , user_phone AS userPhone , user_level AS userLevel , user_job AS userJob FROM user WHERE user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT user_no AS userNo , user_id AS userId , category_no AS catggoryNo , user_pw AS userPw , DATE_FORMAT(user_birth,'%Y년%m월%d일') AS userBirth , user_email AS userEmail , user_nickname AS userNickname , user_telecom AS userTelecom , user_phone AS userPhone , user_level AS userLevel , user_job As userJob , user_joindate AS userJoinDate , user_leavedate AS userLeaveDate FROM user WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND user_pw=#{userPw}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET category_no=#{categoryNo}, user_pw=#{userPw}, user_nickname=#{userNickname}, user_birth=#{userBirth}, user_email=#{userEmail}, user_telecom=#{userTelecom}, user_phone=#{userPhone}, user_level=#{userLevel}, user_job=#{userJob} WHERE user_id= #{userId}
UPDATE user SET user_leavedate=SYSDATE() WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
